unverified_claims.claim: liquid glass of Tahoe design system
unverified_claims.reason: This appears to be an internal/company-specific design system, not an external package. No public documentation found for this specific design system name. It may refer to Apple's visionOS glassmorphism design language or a proprietary design system used within this organization.
This appears to be an internal product version number (26.x), not an external API/library version. It likely refers to an internal version of the software being designed.

recommendations: This task involves UI/UX design changes to native macOS/iOS applications using Apple's native UI frameworks (AppKit/SwiftUI for macOS, UIKit/SwiftUI for iOS)
No external npm/PyPI packages are required for this design upgrade task
The 'liquid glass of Tahoe' design system appears to be internal - implementation team should refer to existing internal design specifications or assets
For native macOS apps, consider using Apple's visual effect views (NSVisualEffectView) for glassmorphism effects
For native iOS apps, consider UIVisualEffectView for blur effects and SF Symbols for consistent iconography
Backward compatibility considerations should focus on iOS/macOS version support rather than library versions

task_type_analysis.note: This is a UI design implementation task, not a library integration task. No external package research required.
